entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grand Forks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers ending this morning then cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries or rain showers in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 12.
